msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />Ooh, look! <20_2 arg="9" /> !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Having something like this outside totally spices up my island stroll!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's weird, I just get this TOTAL chill vibe when I look at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And to thinksome folks say I have NO chill. I can be chill anytime I walk by this spot, !
<20_2 arg="10" />That <20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I get tired during my walk, or my coffee wears off, or whatever<20_3 arg="6" /> I can nap on it? Yaaaaay!

<20_2 arg="10" />What is a TV doing out here?<20_2 arg="9" /> So can I, like, watch it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ooh! We need to have a fab outdoor movie party! You bring popcorn, I'll bring my favorite movieCYBORG PRINCESS XIV: ETERNITY PINBALL!It's a really sweet romantic comedy!
<20_2 arg="10" />So that <20_2 arg="9" />means I can blast music, right?<20_3 arg="3" />Le awesome! New dance studio!

<20_2 arg="10" />Having a clock outside<20_2 arg="9" /> is so handy! Now I don't have to keep pulling out my phone!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Just wear a watch? Awatch? What year do you think this is? "Wear a watch"! HAHAHA!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!I went through a whole phase recently where I thought I'd decorate my house like a forest.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I was in kind of a weird place.
<20_2 arg="10" />So, um <20_2 arg="9" />What gives with the ?<20_3 arg="3" />Ooh! Is it for summertime tiny-pool parties?!<20_3 arg="6" />And in the winter, it can be, like, for tiny-hot-tub parties!
<20_2 arg="10" />Looks like we have right here <20_2 arg="9" />.And that's kind of weird, 'K?

<20_2 arg="10" /> in the middle of my usual stroll! <20_2 arg="9" />That is, wow, SO helpful! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can't tell you how often I'm out here being famous and need a break. This is great!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /> Is someone starting a band?<20_2 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I call vocals! I'm singing!If you see the owner, pass that along, !
<20_2 arg="10" />!<20_2 arg="9" />Eating outside <20_3 arg="3" />would be MAX fun. <20_3 arg="6" />Snacking on food, talking to friends? Yeah!
Exercising outdoors is the best feeling EVER!And <20_2 arg="10" />that <20_2 arg="9" />looks like a<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> great way to do it!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? That's legit hardcore outdoorsy.<20_3 arg="6" /> <20_3 arg="3" />Is someone camping out here?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Good lighting is, like, SO important, don't you think?I mean, when I'm onstage, I want everyone to see me in the best light possible, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmm. Who would put outside?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, I guess it's just an example of someone "thinking outside the box." Only, it's more like they were thinking outside the HOUSE. Hahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmm, I wonder whose this is?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oooh, I'm not sure I can resist the temptation to take a peek at the clothing inside. Butwhat if it's packed full of super-cute outfits! Ugh! I'll be SO jealous, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I guess someone wanted to give this a bit of fresh air or something? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, she used to live out in nature, so I bet she's way happy out here, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Have you seen this? Someone put
here of all places. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Actually, I guess it is pretty awesome to see it out here. Like, how often does THAT happen, ?Maybe outdoor aquariums should be a THING! I would totes go to one of those and take selfies with fish.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Did you see this?! It's le bonkers! Someone went and left here! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's not like I mind. It's just that it's making me think how CRAY it is that dinosaurs walked around here! Like, once upon a time, a dino could have stepped on you RIGHT here!I'm not, like, glad they're extinct, but still WHEW!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, like, it's not where I would put my own .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But still, I like seeing it here. Every time I walk by it, I feel like a totes fancy , you know?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is totes perfect here! Like, it makes an easy-to-remember landmark, right?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So, when I tell everyone, "Meet me at the for a top secret concert starring moi" Everyone will know exactly where the top secret concert is, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />THAT'S très weird. What's up with the ?It looksdifferent. Did it get a makeover or something?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I got a makeover once. But, UGH, it was more like a makeOVER-THE-TOP.They put so much makeup on me, I looked like someone smashed in my face! And THAT'S why I do all my own makeup now, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you think one of my fans put the here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe someone was worried about me overheating?I do practice my pop-star moves out here A LOT. And sometimes I get supes sweaty. Oooh, gross! Don't tell anyone I said that. Pretty please, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ohmigosh! So random! Someone put
here, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's adorbs. But also kinda weird. Like, almost space-alien weird, you know? But who cares! It's from the OCEAN! And I LOVE seeing it up close like this, weirdness and all!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh. My. Gosh. Look at that photo! Who is this SUPERSTAR?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Kidding! I know it's me. Confidence is important, so I have to be my own biggest fan It's exhausting.<20_2 arg="10" />Whoever put this photo here? TOTES hired as my publicist.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aw! I feel like a kid again when I look at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Can you feel it, ? It's a blend of BIG daydreams, MAX energy, and ZERO shame.Hang on That's just me NOW!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I always thought this spot needed .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now it's a perfect backdrop for mega-trendy photo shoots. Ready for my close-up, !

It's super, totes amazing how comfy and cozy this spot is—<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />all thanks to !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Soooooo relaxing. Makes me feel like I'm homewhich is great, because I live here, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Uh-oh! The mean outdoors doesn't seem like a very safe place to put Oh! Duh! Must be weatherproof. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That is LEGIT inspiring.I'll learn how to perform in harsh conditions too! <20_2 arg="10" />You and I are rivals now, !
Ooh! What a fun spot to gather around now that there's here!We can all huddle up in cozy sweats and sip on hot Until we get too hot.Then we switch to iced !
